name: Mont Castillon
description:
You are invited for the most remarkable party at Mont Castillon, sponsored by Lord Nigo Mont Oya the II

And on his casttle is located the legendary Heart of the Mountain! 
You want this treasure, and this party is the perfect excuse to steal it!

But... since is a fancy party with securities, you can`t use your weapons or a spell book, only some scrolls with quick spells to use. 

So, gather your tuxedo, put some spells in the pocket and enjoy the dragontail party looking for your sweet loot!
